meanings.definition: A person who provokes or incites a reaction or response.
meanings.sent1: The provocateurs at the protest were trying to stir up trouble.
meanings.sent2: The police were on the lookout for the provocateurs causing disturbances.
meanings.sent3: The provocateurs thought it would be funny to start a food fight.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as provocateurs, igniting a firestorm of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The provocateurs wore masks to conceal their identities.
